item.title: Express Data Path-202306122251
item.description: Express Data Path-202306122251 Summary Summary for xdp-paper/xdp-the-express-data-path.pdf at master · tohojo/xdp-paper · GitHub Notes XDP The XDP is eBPF based hook The XDP can attach to the network interface controller just after the Interrupt processing Whenever a new packet is received on the network interface, XDP programs receive a callback, and perform operations on the packet.
